content:
That sounds like a great approach! Classic rock and folk are perfect genres for a casual outdoor jam session, and The Beatles and Bob Dylan are excellent choices. Their songs are catchy, familiar, and easy to play along to.

It's wonderful that you're not too focused on perfection and are more concerned with having fun and enjoying the experience. That's what music is all about, right? The fact that you've played some of your own songs before is impressive, but it's also great that you're not too attached to playing only original material.

Improvising and seeing what happens is a big part of the fun, and it's a great way to create new memories with your siblings. You might stumble upon a new favorite song or create a unique arrangement that becomes a family classic.

Since you're playing in a park, you might even attract some curious onlookers or even get some impromptu requests from passersby. That can be a fun way to engage with your surroundings and share your music with others.

Are you planning on bringing any other activities or games to the picnic, or will the music and food be the main attractions?
